ygData.subject: Cocktails for 20
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, Well, just made 20th level over the weekend (and as a result of my recent, now ending, unemployment :o). For the last couple of levels when I solo
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,
Well, just made 20th level over the weekend (and as a result of my recent,
now ending, unemployment :o).

For the last couple of levels when I solo (90% of the time) I have taken to
the following cycle (this was against reavers in E Karana, vs. Magic users
to follow)

Accelerondo to pull

Bellow to tag, and to give a little head start on damage while going back to
an area to fight that was on no wandering mob path.

Warsong/Dennons Disruptive Dischord for the fight.

This was the best combo I found, any suggestions of things I missed? Against
Magic casters it was

Guardian Rhythms to pull
Warsong/Guardian/Bellow or Dischord depending on the location

Now I am adding Largos binding so against non casters I figure it will
change to

Warsong/Lago/Dennons Disruptive Dischord for the fight.


At this level the healing song is still useless in the fight correct? Any
thing I am missing?

Since the bronze armour question was raised, my Str is 80 (85 with item
buffs) I am sticking with the Dwarven tunic until I find something better,
those 33 heat/33 cold/33 magic resists are still nice to have around. I
forget my total AC, but my current armour set (weighing in around 50)is:

Bronze helm (sorry, the wood elf/bronze look was to good to pass up, no
other reason for buying it *blushes*)
Bronze mask
Onyx earrings (+2 dex)
Spiked collar (+3 str)
Bronze shoulders (hope to replace with Blood Stained Mantle)
Dwarven ringmail tunic(12 AC, 33 heat/33 cold/33 magic resist)
Lizardscale Cloak (+5dex)
Barbed arms(+2 dex)
Banded bracers (bronze is WAY too heavy for little gain, currently searching
for an "exotic")
Elf-hide gloves(+5 agi, dex, JUST got them have wanted these forever, I like
to imagine they are Teir'Dal :o)
Dervish rings
Purity belt(dex,str, I have been THINKING of a thick leather apron just for
the AC, but there is also an Elf-hide belt, no idea on stats, just that it
is Bard only)
Bronze legs
Bronze boots (which HAVE to go, they are way to heavy, but I haven't found a
good replacement yet)

Any suggestions or idea would be helpful.

Tszaaz D'Kith (or will be when a GM helps me, /surname accepts no
punctuation)
